subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Piracy at Sea
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Sarah-Jane Blake, an artist, has taken up sailing and feels reconnected to her father, Sir Peter Blake, who was killed by pirates in 2001.
snippet: Sarah-Jane Blake, an artist, has taken up sailing and feels reconnected to her father, Sir Peter Blake, who was killed by pirates in 2001.
